cformat.description: Write a verbose format line for C spec

dformat.description: Write a format line for D spec

body:
/*
 s: S= standalone variable
 L+++: number char/decimal in variable
 I: variable type 
 C.:  number of decimal digets

DName+++++++++++ETDsFrom+++To/L+++IDc.Keywords+++++++++++++++++++++++++ */
dformat-verbose.description: Write a verbose format line for D spec

do.description: Add a loop to a Free rpg project

do_fixed-Format.description: Add a loop to a Free rpg project

dow.description: Add a do wile loop to a Free rpg project

dow_fixed-Format.description: Add a do wile loop to a Free rpg project

fformat.description: Write a format line for F spec

body:
/*
 I:  I= INPUT, O=OUTPUT, U=UPDATE, C=COMBINED
 P:  P=PRIMARY,S=SECONDARY,F=FULL PROCEDURAL
 A:  A=update file
 F:  E=externally described
 K:  K if the file is a keyed, blank for sequential access
 Defice: DISK, PRINTER or WORKSTN
 
FFilename++IPEASF.....L.....A.Device+.Keywords+++++++++++++++++++++++++ */
fformat-verbose.description: Write a verbose format line for F spec

for.description: Add a for loop to a free rpg project

for_fixed-Format.description: Add a fixed format for loop

hformat.description: Write a verbose format line for F spec

if.description: Add a if block to a free rpg project

if_fixed-Format.description: Add a fixed format if block

if/else.description: Add a If Else Block to a free rpg project

body:
C                   if        1 = 1
C                   else
C                   endif
if/else_fixed-Format.description: Add a If Else Block to a free rpg project

Iformat.description: Write a format line for I spec

Iformat-verbose.description: Write a verbose format line for I spec

oformat.description: Write a format line for O spec

oformat-verbose.description: Write a format line for O spec

pformat.description: Write a verbose format line for P spec

body:
/*
  T: B=begin, E=end
  L+++IDc: return value (only on B lines)

PName+++++++++++..T...........L+++IDc.Keywords+++++++++++++++++++++++++ */
pformat-verbose.description: Write a verbose format line for P spec

select.description: Add a select (switch) block to a free rpg project

body:
C                   select
C                   when 1 = 1;
C                   other
C                   endsl
select_fixed-Format.description: Add a fixed format select (switch) block
